item.description:
For the first time, we will be tackling a book of non-fiction. The subtitle of this book is: "The Untold Story of Those who survived the Great American Dust Bowl. " Perhaps it will offer a bit of perspective on our current hard times!

The location will be in a member's home and the details will be kept private. You will be notified before the meetup.

Please bring suggestions for the next book to read. Also, you are welcome to bring your already-read books to swap with other members.
item.name: The Worst Hard Time by Timothy Egan
